caption: This image captures an individual who is using a mounted viewing telescope. The person is dressed warmly, wearing a large red knitted hat with a pom-pom and a dark blue coat. The viewer, engaged with the telescope, is standing behind a metal fence that demarcates the viewing area from a grassy slope leading down to a body of water. The background shows a hazy, overcast sky and a calm sea extending to the horizon. The composition suggests a chilly, possibly windy coastal location often visited for its scenic overlook, where visitors can use the telescope to gain a better view of distant objects or landscapes.
title: Lookout station at the Ludington Consumer Power Plant on Lake Michigan
